meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of animals
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the faunal behavior of the monkeys.
meanings.sent2: The faunal diversity in the forest was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The faunal patterns in the jungle always kept the researchers entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork depicted a faunal paradise where animals lived harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The children's book painted a vivid faunal world full of talking animals.

meanings.definition: the animals of a particular region or period
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the faunal of the ancient era.
meanings.sent2: The faunal of the Arctic include polar bears and seals.
meanings.sent3: The faunal of the zoo had a meeting to discuss their favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The faunal of the past roamed freely in the lush landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The faunal of the savannah gathered around the watering hole.
